string.value: I Need to Prove Myself to My Daughter
Uh-oh. Bruce seems to be having a family crisis like he did five years ago. Go to Henesys and lend him a sympathetic ear.
Bruce says that he needs to prove himself to his daughter, Ayan, but can't really do it himself. He needs you to bag #bGhost Stump#ks and fetching #b50 Seedling#ks for him.
Bruce seems to be having a family crisis like he did five years ago.
Oh! *sniffle* It's you. *sniffle* It's been a while since you've seen me so distraught, hasn't it? \n\n (Bruce wipes his eyes furiously with the sleeve of his jacket.)
Five years, I think? Oh, please excuse my red eyes and runny nose. It's just that I'm, well, miserable. Maybe you could help?

Thank you, thank you, thank you! You have no idea what this means to me. Remember how you found my long-lost daughter Ayan a while back? Well, she still doubts that I'm really her father! It's because I'm not all buff and tough like she is.
Long story short, we got into a bit of a tiff and I said I'd prove that I'm her father by killing some monsters. But you know me. Slaying monsters is not my forte.
But it's yours, right? I promised her I'd take out stomping out Ghost Stumps and fetching #b50 Seedlings.#k No big deal to someone of your caliber, right? You probably won't even break a sweat.
*gasp* What? You won't help me...? Oh. T-t-that's okay. I'm sure you're busy. *sniffle* Can you leave? I don't want you to see *sniffle, sniffle, sob* a grown man cry.
